bill_title: prohibit certain persons with gaming licenses from making certain political contributions.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit certain persons with gaming licenses from making certain political contributions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 12-25 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Before any person may be issued a license pursuant to § 42-7A-41 or 42-7B-22 or may have such a license renewed, the person shall agree, in writing, to not make any contributions to any candidate, candidate's committee, political action committee, or political party for any local, state, or federal election. If such a person violates this agreement, the person is guilty of a Class 2 misdemeanor, and the person's license shall be revoked. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
